channel.title: Contrast Maximization on Henri Rebecq
channel.description: Recent content in Contrast Maximization on Henri Rebecq

item.title: New paper accepted at CVPR'18!
item.description: Our paper A Unifying Contrast Maximization Framework for Event Cameras, with Applications to Motion, Depth and Optical Flow Estimation (together with Guillermo Gallego and Davide Scaramuzza) was accepted for spotlight presentation at CVPR’18!
